content: Looking at the example of a Batch Validation, on http://hl7-fhir.github.io/terminology-service.html , at Section 4.1.5.7 - should the URL properties within each transaction request contain the $validate-code operation? The examples in Section 4.1.5.9 for Batch Translation do place the $translate operation within the URL property of each transaction request.
they are typos. should all have $validate-code. I'll fix them now
